name: Brunch Baked French Toast
author: GAIL BOYD
summary: Easy, easy, serve with anything you like; kids love this one and so do adults.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) loaf French bread, cut into 1-inch slices
2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk eggs, milk, and salt together in a bowl; pour into a shallow dish
Soak bread slices in egg mixture until saturated
Spread softened butter over the bottom of a 10x15-inch jelly roll pan
Sprinkle brown sugar over the butter
Arrange bread slices onto sugar in a single layer; sprinkle with cinnamon
Bake in preheated oven until beginning to firm, 25 to 30 minutes
